definitions.definition: To direct words , thoughts , or one's attention to a deity or any higher being, for the sake of adoration , thanks , petition for help, etc.
examples: Muslims pray in the direction of Mecca.

definitions.definition: To humbly beg a person for aid or their time .
To ask earnestly for; to seek to obtain by supplication ; to entreat for.
To wish or hope strongly for a particular outcome.
examples: She is praying that the Red Sox will win tonight.

definitions.definition: To implore , to entreat, to request .

main_definition: ( religion ) To direct words , thoughts , or one's attention to a deity or any higher being, for the sake of adoration , thanks , petition for help, etc.
secondary_definitions: To humbly beg a person for aid or their time .
( obsolete ) To ask earnestly for; to seek to obtain by supplication ; to entreat for.
To wish or hope strongly for a particular outcome.
( obsolete or law ) To implore , to entreat, to request .
